title: Advanced diesel from ethanol, a pathway to produce sustainable and high-quality drop-in biofuels
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00943F, Paper
Juan Manuel Restrepo Florez, Javier E. Chavarrio, Emmanuel Canales, Dustin Witkowski, Srinath Subramanian, Paolo A. Cuello-Penaloza, David Rothamer, Christos T. Maravelias, George W. Huber
In this work, we develop a novel technology for the transformation of ethanol into diesel via Guerbet coupling and etherification. Our strategy overcomes the limitations of previous works, namely, the...
